text: William "Bill" Margold (October 2, 1943 - January 18, 2017) was an American pornographic actor and director. He was born in Washington, D.C., the capital of the United States. He began his career in 1972. He continued to perform until 2007. He had more than 250 credits to his name as an actor and director. He was added to the AVN Hall of Fame. Margold died on January 18, 2017 in Los Angeles, California at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * William Margold at the Internet Adult Film Database Category:1943 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Washington, D.C.
